name: A MURDER IN TOWN
description:
A dark entity, trapped as a scarecrow for all eternity, seeks revenge... and finds an unlikely ally.

A MURDER IN TOWN

Place as a crow, empowered by a dark deity held within a scarecrow, as you mildly inconvenience the townsfolk and do thine entities bidding!

Controls:
  • WASD: Move
  • SPACE: 'Caw'
  • RMB: Attack
Gameplay & Hints

Keep an eye on the four locations around town, and stop any events from happening, by using your 'caw' ability next to them.

Each event you unsuccessfully stop will damage the entity who grants you your powers!

Scarecrows will spawn around town, use your attacks to defeat them, but remember that they are not your primary objective - defeating them merely makes your life easier.

Each upgrade in the shop costs one point - earn points by successfully stopping tasks. You'll need to grow stronger as the days continue...
